SEARCH
程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.handler

类 TransactionRequestHandler

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.handler.TransactionRequestHandler
public class TransactionRequestHandler extends Object
Handler for processing transaction-related requests. Provides methods for classifying, importing, retrieving, searching, exporting, updating, deleting, and manually adding transactions.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    TransactionRequestHandler()
    Default constructor initializing TransactionService with its implementation.
    TransactionRequestHandler(TransactionService transactionService)
    Constructor with custom TransactionService.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • TransactionRequestHandler

      public TransactionRequestHandler()
      Default constructor initializing TransactionService with its implementation.

    • TransactionRequestHandler

      public TransactionRequestHandler(TransactionService transactionService)
      Constructor with custom TransactionService.
      参数:
      transactionService - the transaction service to use

  • 方法详细资料

    • handleTransactionClassificationRequest

      public List<Map<Transaction,DynamicBillType>> handleTransactionClassificationRequest(TransactionClassificationRequest request) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to classify transactions from a file.
      参数:
      request - the transaction classification request containing user ID and file path
      返回:
      a list of maps pairing transactions with their dynamic bill types
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the file path is invalid or file type is unsupported

    • handleTransactionImportRequest

      public List<Map<Transaction,DynamicBillType>> handleTransactionImportRequest(TransactionImportRequest request) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to import classified transactions.
      参数:
      request - the transaction import request containing user ID, account ID, and transactions
      返回:
      a list of maps pairing transactions with their dynamic bill types after saving
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if saving fails

    • handleGetTransactionsByUserId

      public List<TransactionDto> handleGetTransactionsByUserId(GetTransactionByUserIdRequest request) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to get transactions by user ID.
      参数:
      request - the request containing the user ID
      返回:
      a list of transaction DTOs for the user
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the user ID is invalid

    • handleGetTransactionsByAccountId

      public List<TransactionDto> handleGetTransactionsByAccountId(String userId, String accountId) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to get transactions by account ID.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      accountId - the account ID
      返回:
      a list of transaction DTOs for the account
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if user ID or account ID is invalid

    • handleSearchTransactions

      public List<TransactionDto> handleSearchTransactions(TransactionServiceImpl.TransactionSearchCriteria criteria) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to search transactions by criteria.
      参数:
      criteria - the transaction search criteria
      返回:
      a list of transaction DTOs matching the criteria
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the criteria is null

    • handleExportTransactionsToCsv

      public void handleExportTransactionsToCsv(String filePath) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to export transactions to a CSV file.
      参数:
      filePath - the file path to export to
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the file path is invalid

    • handleExportTransactionsToExcel

      public void handleExportTransactionsToExcel(String filePath) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to export transactions to an Excel file.
      参数:
      filePath - the file path to export to
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the file path is invalid

    • handleUpdateTransactionStatus

      public TransactionDto handleUpdateTransactionStatus(String transactionId, String status) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to update the status of a transaction.
      参数:
      transactionId - the transaction ID
      status - the new status
      返回:
      the updated transaction DTO
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if transaction ID or status is invalid

    • handleDeleteTransaction

      public void handleDeleteTransaction(String transactionId) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to delete a transaction.
      参数:
      transactionId - the transaction ID
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if the transaction ID is invalid

    • handleGetCounterpartyStatistics

      public Map<String,String> handleGetCounterpartyStatistics()
      Handles the request to get counterparty statistics.
      返回:
      a map of counterparty statistics

    • handleAddTransactionManually

      public TransactionDto handleAddTransactionManually(String userId, String incomeOrExpense, String amount, LocalDateTime time, String product, String type, String accountId, String remark) throws ServiceException
      Handles the request to manually add a transaction.
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      incomeOrExpense - income or expense type
      amount - the transaction amount
      time - the transaction time
      product - the product name
      type - the transaction type
      accountId - the account ID
      remark - additional remarks
      返回:
      the added transaction DTO
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if any required parameter is invalid
